mapper.select: SELECT exercise_no as exerciseNo ,exercise_name as exerciseName ,exercise_calorie as exerciseCalorie ,exercise_date as exerciseDate FROM exercise WHERE exercise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sv},'%')

SELECT a.member_no as memberNo ,a.ingest_weight as ingestWeight ,a.ingest_calorie_date as ingestCalorieDate ,b.food_name as foodName ,b.food_once as totalOnce ,b.food_kcal as totalKcal ,b.food_carbohydrate as totalCarbohydrate ,b.food_protein as totalProtein ,b.food_fat as totalFat ,b.food_sugar as totalSugar ,b.food_natrium as totalNatrium ,b.food_cholesterol as totalCholesterol ,b.food_sfa as totalSfa FROM ingest_calorie a, food b WHERE a.food_no = b.food_no and a.member_no=#{memberNo} and YEAR(a.ingest_calorie_date) = #{pickYear} and MONTH(a.ingest_calorie_date) = #{pickMonth} and DAY(a.ingest_calorie_date) = #{pickDay}

SELECT a.ingest_calorie_no as ingestCalorieNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.food_no as foodNo ,a.ingest_weight as IngestWeight ,a.ingest_calorie_date as ingestCalorieDate ,b.food_name as foodName FROM ingest_calorie a, food b WHERE a.food_no = b.food_no AND member_no=#{memberNo} ORDER BY ingest_calorie_date DESC

SELECT food_no as foodNo ,food_group as foodGroup ,food_name as foodName ,food_once as foodOnce ,food_kcal as foodKcal ,food_carbohydrate as foodCarbohydrate ,food_protein as foodProtein ,food_fat as foodFat ,food_sugar as foodSugar ,food_natrium as foodNatrium ,food_cholesterol as foodCholesterol ,food_sfa as foodSfa ,food_build_year as foodBuildYear FROM food WHERE food_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sv},'%')
